eu.amidst.latentvariablemodels.dynamicmodels.classifiers

Class DynamicClassifier

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.amidst.latentvariablemodels.dynamicmodels.DynamicModel
      • eu.amidst.latentvariablemodels.dynamicmodels.classifiers.DynamicClassifier
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DynamicLatentClassificationModel

    public abstract class DynamicClassifier
extends DynamicModel
    The DynamicClassifier abstract class is defined for dynamic Bayesian classification models. Created by ana@cs.aau.dk on 11/03/16.

      • getClassVar

        public Variable getClassVar()
        Method to obtain the class variable
        Returns:
        object of the type Variable indicating which is the class variable

      • setClassVar

        public void setClassVar(Variable classVar)
        Method to set the class variable. Note that it should be multinomial
        Parameters:
        classVar - object of the type Variable indicating which is the class variable

      • setClassName

        public void setClassName(String className)
                  throws WrongConfigurationException
        Method to set the class variable. Note that it should be multinomial
        Parameters:
        className - String with the name of the class variable
        Throws:
        WrongConfigurationException - is thrown when the variable is not a multinomial.

      • predict

        public Multinomial predict(DynamicDataInstance instance)
        Predicts the class membership probabilities for a given instance.
        Parameters:
        instance - the data instance to be classified. The value associated to the class variable must be a missing value (i.e. a NaN)
        Returns:
        the posterior probability of the class variable
